commit.message:
gengtype-yacc.y (optionseqopt): Add the ending `;' to the action.

2002-06-07  Akim Demaille  <akim@epita.fr>

	* gengtype-yacc.y (optionseqopt): Add the ending `;' to the action.
	Whitespace changes.

From-SVN: r54348

files.patch:

+
+	* gengtype-yacc.y (optionseqopt): Add the ending `;' to the action.
+	Whitespace changes.
